about.title: About
about.text1: The {highlight} project is an educational program that challenges engineering students to design, build and pilot radio-controlled aircraft.
about.text2: The main objective is the improvement of technical and practical knowledge, putting students in contact with industrial tools, design methodologies and teamwork.
about.text3: In the {highlight} class, the challenge is to develop an aircraft capable of carrying payload, made with simple materials and with severe geometry and weight restrictions, requiring high structural and aerodynamic efficiency.

trajectory.title: Our History
trajectory.subtitle: From 2010 until today, we have built a history of victories, learning and overcoming, making UFSJ a reference in national aerodesign.

2010.title: Foundation
2010.description: Creation of Trem Ki Voa Micro Team at UFSJ.

2012.title: First Competition
2012.description: Participation in SAE Brasil Aerodesign competition.

2015.title: Expansion
2015.description: Team growth and new aircraft projects.

2023.title: Innovation
2023.description: Development of new technologies and methodologies.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Trem Ki Voa's strength comes from the dedication and passion of each of our members.
